sections.heading: 01|Lease or sale of municipal property
sections.text: Effective:September 29, 2013Latest Legislation:House Bill 59 - 130th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFMunicipal corporations have special power to sell or lease real estate or to sell personal property belonging to the municipal corporation, when

sections.heading: the Revised Code have no retroactive effect to validate or add to the effect of any previous act of a municipal corporation concerning territory or public rights described in section721
sections.text: 04of the Revised Code. Those sections have no effect, except as expressly provided in sections721.04to721.11and150
